transcript: what makes a company appealing the first and biggest one is is it a company that we feel like we can add a lot of value to the second is is it big enough for us to get into you know if someone has just one location it's hard to say that they have a good model or they just a good operator we'd want to see at least three ideally five or more locations with good unit economics meaning each individual box makes money and it makes sense in terms of how it makes money but I'll just give you the last one which is the founder itself most of the time we DQ Founders more than businesses
